General Settings:Slot

Short name: Slot

Requires: Base Development System

Classes: PXI Instr, VXI/GPIB-VXI/VME RBD Instr, Instr, VXI/GPIB-VXI MBD Instr

Returns the physical slot location of the device. If the slot is unknown, the value returned is -1.

Noteï¿½ In the Instr class, this property is valid only for GPIB-VXI, VXI, and PXI/PCI resources.

Remarks

The following table lists the characteristics of this property.

Data type
Permissions Read Only
